name: dexi-amm-monitor
description: The DEXI AMM Monitor is designed to aggregate and process data from Automated Market Makers (AMMs). This agent operates in two modes: - **Pull Mode:** Loads data from the gateway. - **Push Mode:** Receives data directly from the AMM processes. These modes work in conjunction to ensure the agent maintains up-to-date AMM statistics, which are accessible and displayable through the frontend via dry runs.
author: Autonomous Research
